channel.title: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?
channel.description: What's the highest rated comment on Youtube?

item.title: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:10, topic:396224”]to everyone that doesnt know u can get past youtubes blocks(county and maturity). by simply doing replacing “watch?v=” with “v/” an example would be: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Lu0qhRrIow to http://www.youtube.com/v/1Lu0qhRrIow i figured that out and do that when im too lazy to sign in.

also if u know what ur doing idk or not but u used to be able to download the video by messing with the url.[/quote]
I can finally watch Zezima’s bank vid…

Read full topic
item.source: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?

item.title: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

iCreatedHorror:

Except when you click play, it doesn’t.

dang… well at least it works for the 18+ videos. plus i didnt test it out i just assumed it did since it showed a thumbnail. sorry about that. im sure there is a way to get around that though. maybe a proxy or something, but the proxy server would have to be located in a country that can view the video. ill fix the comment. thx

Read full topic
item.source: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?

item.title: Most thumbs up on a youtube comment?
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

to everyone that doesnt know u can get past youtubes blocks(county and maturity). by simply doing replacing “watch?v=” with “v/” an example would be: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Lu0qhRrIow to http://www.youtube.com/v/1Lu0qhRrIow i figured that out and do that when im too lazy to sign in.

also if u know what ur doing idk or not but u used to be able to download the video by messing with the url.

Read full topic

item.description:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Lu0qhRrIow&has_verif­ied=1

and yes there is pornographic material in the video although theres a comment with 206k thumbs up its on a video not available in the Us

That was fake as shit lol.

Found alot on here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2y_hp7TfBm4&feature=relmfu

Yeah that’s the one I saw. I was just wondering if anyone knew a video with 100k+.
[/quote]
halo3rocks24029 had a comment with over 1m you could try searching for it but i think it got deleted[/quote]
